Parameter.Title: Country code
Parameter.Description:
You may specify country using the country parameter.

Only ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 formatted country codes are allowed.

Currently only these countries are supported:

  • NO - Norway
  • DK - Denmark
  • SE - Sweden
  • FI - Finland
  • NL - Netherlands

This service queries GeoNames for all countries except for Norway.

Blank response

If the response returns valid but postal name is blank, it is either because:

  • There are multiple postal names for the given postal code. This is the case in France and several other countries.
  • This service does not have any postal code data for the given country.

If the response is blank and a postal name is required, it is recommended to ask the user input it himself/herself.
